videos.title: Unity Localization Package || إضافة العديد من اللغات داخل اللعبة
videos.description:
هذا الفيديو يشرح كيفية إضافة العديد من اللغات داخل اللعبة بواسطة أداة مقدمة من يونيتي، تعديل الصور والنصوص والأصوات أصبح الآن أسهل بكثير
Unity Localization Documentation:  https://docs.unity3d.com/Packages/com.unity.localization@0.8
Arabic fix site : http://www.arabic-keyboard.org/photoshop-arabic/

videos.title: Unity Post Processing || تأثيرات المعالجة النهائية

videos.title: Unity Asset Store أكثر 10 أدوات مجانية تحميلاً على
videos.description:
هذا الفيديو يشرح Unity Asset Store أكثر 10 أدوات مجانية تحميلاً على 
للتنزيل : 
1. Graphy: https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/tools/gui/graphy-ultimate-fps-counter-stats-monitor-debugger-105778
2. Path Creator: https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/tools/utilities/b-zier-path-creator-136082
3. Umodeler Lite: https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/tools/modeling/umodeler-lite-133081
4. Simple Input System: https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/tools/input-management/simple-input-system-113033
5. Bolt: https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/tools/visual-scripting/bolt-163802
6. Dialogue Editor: https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/tools/utilities/dialogue-editor-168329
7. Map Magic: https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/tools/terrain/mapmagic-2-165180
8. DOTween: https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/tools/animation/dotween-hotween-v2-27676
9. Native Share for Android & iOS: https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/tools/integration/native-share-for-android-ios-112731
10.  Hierarchy Dividers: https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/tools/utilities/hierarchy-dividers-140876

········································­­·······································­·­····
